name: DeathSky
description:
Tear up the skies in DeathSky, a top down arena survival airplane shooter wherein your goal is to survive waves after waves of enemy planes while racking up points by collecting air crates. These crates will provide you random arsenal of weapons as inspired by vlambeer’s Super Crate Box mechanics. This is further mixed up by having RPG elements wherein you level up and gain points. You may choose to get stronger or faster or get additional durability for a cost of points earned from leveling up. Its all up to you. Simple, brutal and fun.

The game features a unique mix of noir-esque art and 8-bit pixel art - a tribute to old classics.
